item.title: Itinerary
item.dc:creator: cozy-communities-production
item.content:encoded:
Welcome Drinks & Catch-Up

Time: 2:00 PM

Kick off the celebration with a refreshing drink at the beach bar as everyone arrives. It’s the perfect time to catch up, meet new friends, and soak in the sun. Don’t forget to grab your welcome drink and start mingling—let’s get this party started!

Beach Games & Fun in the Sun

Time: 3:00 PM

Get ready for some friendly competition with beach volleyball, frisbee, and more! Whether you’re in it to win it or just want to have fun, there’s something for everyone. Bring your A-game, or just cheer on your friends from the sidelines with a drink in hand!

Group Photo Session

Time: 5:00 PM

Let’s capture the moment with a group photo to remember Alex’s big day! Gather around as we snap a few shots with the ocean as our backdrop. Be sure to bring your best smile, and let’s create a keepsake that Alex will cherish forever.

Sunset Dinner by the Shore

Time: 6:00 PM

As the sun begins to set, we’ll gather for a delicious dinner by the shore. Enjoy a meal with friends while taking in the stunning view, followed by a few toasts to celebrate Alex. This is the time to relax, enjoy, and reflect on all the good times we’ve shared.

Bonfire & Cake Cutting

Time: 8:00 PM

As the night falls, we’ll light up a bonfire and gather around for Alex’s birthday cake. Sing, make a wish, and enjoy some sweet treats by the fire. Feel free to bring along a story or two to share—this is where the magic of the night truly begins.

Dance Party Under the Stars

Time: 9:00 PM

The night is young, and the music is calling! Join us for a dance party right on the beach. Whether you’re busting out your best moves or just enjoying the vibes, this is the time to let loose and have fun with friends. Don’t worry—no one’s judging your dance skills here!

Afterparty Chill-Out Lounge

Time: 11:00 PM

Wind down the evening in our chill-out lounge area. Grab a cozy seat, enjoy some mellow tunes, and reflect on the amazing day we’ve had. Whether you want to chat, stargaze, or simply relax, this is the perfect way to close out the celebration with Alex and friends.

Important Things to Know

Got questions? Here, you'll find the answers to the Frequently Asked ones and some vital info to be fully prepared for a fantastic day at the beach!

item.title: Policy & Beach Party Guidelines
item.dc:creator: cozy-communities-production
item.content:encoded:
Effective Date: When the sun hits just right
Last Updated: Every time someone asks "What time should I arrive?"

Data We Collect

Personal Information

We collect your name, embarrassing stories about Alex, and your ability to play beach volleyball (spoiler: most of you can't). We also track how many times you've asked "What should I bring?" despite reading the FAQ seventeen times.

Beach Behavior Analytics

Our advanced monitoring systems (Emily with a clipboard) will be tracking:

  • Number of times you reapply sunscreen (correlation with lobster-like appearance)
  • Dance move quality during the evening festivities
  • Ability to keep sand out of your food (impossible, we know)
  • Frequency of "remember when we were in college" stories

Photo Documentation

Every unflattering mid-chew photo, every "candid" shot where you're picking something out of your teeth, and definitely that moment when you think no one is looking but Marcus is literally right there with his camera.

How We Use Your Information

For Party Optimization

We use your dietary preferences to ensure Dallas doesn't accidentally grill you a burger when you clearly stated you're vegetarian. We also use your transportation info to coordinate rides and minimize the "I'm lost" text messages to Emily.

For Future Blackmail Material

Any embarrassing moments will be stored indefinitely for use at future birthday parties, wedding speeches, and general weekend entertainment. This includes but is not limited to: your attempt at the limbo, your interpretive dance to "Baby Shark," and that time you confidently stated you "definitely know how to build a sandcastle."

For Social Media Shenanigans

Photos may appear on various social media platforms with captions ranging from sweet birthday messages to "LOL look at this absolute legend trying to spike a volleyball."

Your Rights

Right to Be Forgotten

Sorry, once you do something embarrassing at Alex's party, it becomes part of the permanent record. This is non-negotiable and will be referenced at every future gathering.

Right to Data Portability

You have the right to take home leftover cake, sandy flip-flops, and approximately 47 new inside jokes that won't make sense to anyone who wasn't there.

Right to Object

You may object to being assigned to Agnes's volleyball team, but your objections will be overruled by the official party democracy (aka Emily's clipboard).

Cookies Policy

We use cookies (the chocolate chip kind) and other tracking technologies (Marcus's camera) to enhance your beach party experience. By attending this party, you consent to consuming way too much sugar and having every moment documented for posterity.

Data Retention

We will retain your party participation data until:

  • Alex stops talking about how awesome their 25th birthday was (never)
  • The group chat stops sending memes from the party (also never)
  • Someone else does something more embarrassing (unlikely but possible)

Third-Party Sharing

Your information may be shared with:

  • Future party planners who need to know your dietary restrictions
  • Alex's mom, who will definitely ask Emily for all the photos
  • The local seagull population, who seem very interested in your sandwich choices

Security Measures

We protect your data using state-of-the-art security measures including:

  • Emily's color-coded spreadsheets (military-grade organization)
  • Dallas's protective stance around the grill (no unauthorized access to burgers)
  • Sofia's ability to distract people with impromptu dance performances

Changes to This Policy

We reserve the right to update this policy whenever someone does something so ridiculous that it requires new categories of data collection. You will be notified of changes via the group chat, probably at 2 AM when someone remembers something funny that happened.

Contact Information

If you have questions about this privacy policy, your data rights, or why we have 47 photos of you trying to eat a s'more without getting marshmallow in your hair, please contact:

Emily (Party Data Controller)
Email: emily.party.planner@beachparty.demo
Phone: 888-888-8888
Office Hours: 24/7 during party week, because someone always needs something

By checking "I agree to Sample Page," you acknowledge that you've read this entire policy, laughed at least three times, and are fully prepared to have the best time at Alex's 25th birthday beach extravaganza. You also agree that Alex deserves an absolutely amazing birthday celebration and that you'll do everything in your power to make that happen.

Remember: This is a demo website for showcasing WordPress community features. No real data is collected, no real privacy policies apply, and no real marshmallows were harmed in the making of this page.

item.title: cozy-communities
item.dc:creator: cozy-communities-production

item.title: Countdown to Alex’s 25th Birthday Bash!
item.dc:creator: cozy-communities-production
item.content:encoded:
Hey everyone!

The countdown is officially on—only 120 days left until we all come together to celebrate Alex’s 25th birthday at Golden Sands Shore! 🌞🎉

We’ve been working hard to make this day unforgettable, and we’re so excited to see everyone. From the beach games to the sunset dinner, every detail is being planned to make sure it’s a day full of fun, laughter, and amazing memories.

A few reminders as we get closer:

  • RSVP: If you haven’t already, please make sure to RSVP so we know you’re coming.
  • Parking: Remember, free parking is available, but spots might fill up fast, so plan to arrive a little early.
  • What to Bring: Don’t forget your beach essentials—towel, sunscreen, and maybe a hat or sunglasses. And of course, your best party vibes!

We’ll be posting more updates as the day approaches, so stay tuned. We can’t wait to celebrate with you all and make Alex’s 25th a day to remember!

Cheers,
Alex's sister Emily

item.title: Venue: Celebrate at Golden Sands Shore
item.dc:creator: cozy-communities-production
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to Golden Sands Shore—the perfect backdrop for Alex’s 25th birthday celebration! 🌊✨

Imagine a day filled with sunshine, gentle ocean breezes, and the sound of waves crashing on the shore as you gather with friends to celebrate Alex’s big milestone. Golden Sands Shore isn’t just any beach—it’s a slice of paradise where every corner is a photo-worthy moment waiting to happen.

Whether you’re lounging under a beach umbrella, playing a friendly game of volleyball, or enjoying a sunset dinner by the water, this beach has something for everyone. As the day turns to night, we’ll light up the bonfire and continue the festivities under a starry sky, with the ocean as our soundtrack.

Why Golden Sands Shore is Perfect:

  • Breathtaking Views: With its golden sands, clear blue waters, and stunning sunsets, this beach is the ultimate spot for an unforgettable celebration.
  • Plenty of Space: Whether you want to join in on the beach games or find a quiet spot to relax and catch up, there’s room for everyone.
  • Convenient Location: Located just 40 minutes from Town, it’s easy to get to and has plenty of free parking.
  • All-Day Fun: From our welcome drinks in the afternoon to the bonfire at night, Golden Sands Shore is the ideal place to celebrate Alex with non-stop fun.

Address: Golden Sands Shore, [Address Details]
Parking: Free parking is available near the beach entrance. Arrive early to secure your spot!

Pack your beach bag, bring your best stories, and get ready to celebrate Alex in style at Golden Sands Shore. This is where memories will be made, laughs will be shared, and Alex’s 25th birthday will be one for the books.

item.title: F.A.Q.
item.dc:creator: cozy-communities-production
item.content:encoded:
When's this shindig happening? (What time does the party start and end?)

We're kicking off at 2:00 PM sharp (beach time = fashionably late is totally fine) and partying until the sun gives up and goes to bed, around 7:30 PM. No one's taking attendance, so show up whenever your beach body is ready!

What's the beach party survival kit? (What should I bring?)

Bring sunscreen (unless you're going for the lobster look), a towel (for sitting, not crying), and swimwear (skinny dipping is frowned upon). We've got the burgers, drinks, and wobbly beach chairs covered!

Where do I park my chariot? (or: Is there parking available?)

There's a magical parking lot right by the beach entrance. Pro tip: Early birds get the spots, late birds get the 10-minute hike from the overflow lot. Choose your adventure!

Can I bring my significant other, work bestie, or emotional support person? (aka: "Can I bring a plus-one?")

YES! The more the merrier! Just give us a heads up so we don't run out of hot dogs. We draw the line at bringing your ex though – this is a party, not a reality show.

Will I need to hunt for my own food like a beach seagull? (aka: should we bring our own food and drinks? or can we?)

We've got you covered with enough food and drinks to feed a small army! But if you're picky, have special cravings, or just really love that one specific snack, bring it along. Got dietary restrictions? Give us a heads up so we don't accidentally feed you something your stomach will regret later.

I don't eat meat. Will I starve? (or: Will there be vegetarian/vegan options?)

Fear not, herbivore friends! We've got veggie burgers that don't taste like cardboard, grilled veggies that'll make carnivores question their ways, and enough fruit to start your own smoothie business.

What if Mother Nature decides to crash the party with rain?

Rain or shine, we're beach-bound! We've got a covered pavilion area where you can stay dry while still enjoying the ocean view. Plus, we're bringing rain-proof games, waterproof speakers for dance parties, and extra beach umbrellas. Think of it as "extreme beach partying" – because nothing stops Alex's birthday bash! (And let's be honest, dancing in the rain is kind of epic.)

Do I need to bring a gift for the birthday human? (aka: Alex)

Your beautiful face is present enough! But if you're feeling generous, Alex has an unhealthy obsession with board games and travel books. Or just bring a funny birthday card – bonus points if it makes us snort-laugh!

What's the dress code? Ball gowns and tuxedos?

Please, no! We're going full beach casual – think "I woke up like this" but make it cute. Light, breezy clothes are your friend, and YES bring that swimsuit! Don't forget sunscreen (lobster is not a good look) and sunglasses (squinting ruins photos). When the sun dips, you'll want a light jacket or blanket for the bonfire – s'mores taste better when you're cozy!

When's the mandatory "let's pretend we all like each other" group photo?

5:00 PM sharp! Be there or be forever cropped out of the memories. We're doing this proper Instagram-worthy style, so bring your best smile (or at least your best "I'm having fun" face). This is the one photo Alex's mom will frame forever!

Who do I call if I'm lost/confused/having an existential crisis at (or before) the party? (or: contact info and what to do if you have questions)

Emily (Alex's sister and party superhero) is your go-to person at 888-888-8888. She's got answers to everything from "Where's the bathroom?" to "Why are we all here?" Save her number – she's basically party Google.

What's the real point of all this?

Have. Fun. Period. This isn't just another beach day – it's Alex's quarter-century celebration! Come ready to laugh until your sides hurt, make memories that'll embarrass us in 10 years, and celebrate our friend in the most ridiculously awesome way possible. Bonus points if you start a conga line!

item.title: Exciting Updates & Special Surprises for Alex’s Party!
item.dc:creator: cozy-communities-production
item.content:encoded:
Hello party people!

We’re just a few weeks away from Alex’s big 2-5 celebration, and we’ve got some exciting updates to share with you! 🎉

First off, we’re thrilled to announce a couple of special surprises that we’ve added to the itinerary:

  • Live Music at the Bonfire: We’ve arranged for a live acoustic performance during the bonfire session! Get ready to sing along to some of Alex’s favorite tunes under the stars.
  • Personalized Party Favors: We’re putting together some fun, personalized party favors for each of you to take home as a memento of the day. Trust us—you’ll love them!

A few things to keep in mind:

  • Group Photo: The group photo is happening at 5:00 PM sharp. Make sure you’re there—this is one picture you won’t want to miss!
  • Weather Watch: The forecast looks sunny, but just in case, keep an eye out for any weather updates. We’ll let you know if anything changes.

We’re so excited to see everyone and celebrate the amazing person Alex is. Get ready for a day full of fun, friends, and fantastic memories!

Stay tuned for more updates, and see you soon at Golden Sands Shore!

Best,
Emily
Director of Festivities & Fun

item.dc:creator: agnes.veum
item.content:encoded:
Hey everyone! 👋 I'm SO in for volleyball! Fair warning though - my serves are about as reliable as beach wifi, but I make up for it with enthusiasm and really loud cheering 😂
I can play any position (badly) but I'm best at not getting in the way. Who needs a team member that brings more spirit than skill? I promise to dive dramatically for every ball, even if I miss 90% of them!
Also, can we please have team names? I vote for "Sandy Cheeks" or "Sets on the Beach" 🏐🌊
P.S. I'll bring extra sunscreen for my team because sunburned volleyball players are no fun!

item.dc:creator: sofia_dances
item.content:encoded: Listen up frisbee fanatics! 🥏 I may be known for my dance moves, but don't sleep on my frisbee skills! I've got surprisingly good hand-eye coordination (all those years of catching dance props finally paying off lol). I'm hereby challenging EVERYONE to bring their A-game because Sofia's coming for that frisbee crown! Fair warning: I will be doing victory dances after every good throw, so prepare yourselves for some impromptu choreography on the beach 😂 Who's ready to get schooled by someone who spends more time practicing pirouettes than frisbee throws? The trash talk starts NOW! Bring it on, beach warriors! 💪

item.title: About This Site
item.dc:creator: cozy-communities-production
item.content:encoded:
Building Cozy Communities That Are Truly Ours

This beach party website isn't just about celebrating Alex's 25th birthday. It's a showcase of what's possible when you combine the power of WordPress with the warmth of genuine community connection.

What You're Looking At

This demo site demonstrates how WordPress, paired with plugins like bbPress and BuddyPress, can create intimate, engaging online spaces that feel more like a close-knit friend group than a massive social network. Every feature you see here (from the guest profiles and forum discussions to the event coordination and photo sharing) represents tools that real communities can use to bring people together.

The Magic Behind the Scenes

WordPress Core: The foundation that makes everything possible, providing flexibility and reliability for communities of any size.

bbPress: Powers our forum system where Agnes coordinates volleyball teams, Marcus shares photography tips, and Sofia gets everyone excited about dancing under the stars.

BuddyPress: Creates the member profiles and social features that let Dallas showcase his BBQ expertise and Emily coordinate all the party logistics.

Open Source Customizations: We've built on WordPress's Twenty Twenty-Four theme with a few thoughtful design tweaks and carefully selected plugins that transform standard community tools into something that feels personal and inviting. Everything we've created is open source and ready for you to use. Including the “Community Tags” plugin we created for this project.

Get Started with Our Blueprint

You can read all about the technical implementation details on our dedicated page, where you can also download a complete WordPress blueprint of this site to use as a starting point for your own community.

Why "Cozy Communities" Matter

In a world of algorithm-driven feeds and endless scrolling, there's something powerful about creating spaces where:

  • Every member has a voice and a story
  • Conversations have context and continuity
  • People actually know each other's names (and dietary preferences!)
  • Shared experiences create lasting connections

What This Could Be for You

Imagine using these same tools to create:

  • Neighborhood Groups: Coordinate block parties, share local recommendations, and build real relationships with people who live nearby
  • Hobby Communities: Whether it's book clubs, hiking groups, or crafting circles, create spaces where enthusiasts can truly connect
  • Event Coordination: From family reunions to professional meetups, give your gatherings the digital foundation they deserve
  • Learning Circles: Study groups, skill shares, and educational communities that feel supportive rather than competitive
  • Support Networks: Safe spaces where people can share experiences, offer help, and build genuine connections

The Philosophy

We believe the best online communities feel less like social media and more like gathering around a kitchen table. They're places where:

  • Quality conversations matter more than viral content
  • Members support each other's goals and celebrate wins together
  • Inside jokes develop naturally and memories are made
  • Everyone feels welcome, valued, and heard

Ready to Build Your Own?

This Alex's birthday party demo shows just one way to bring people together online. Your cozy community could look completely different – and that's exactly the point. WordPress gives you the foundation, these community plugins provide the features, and your unique vision creates the magic.

Whether you're organizing a monthly game night, building a local artist collective, or creating a space for new parents to connect, the tools exist to make something beautiful and meaningful.

This is demo content (AI Powered)

All characters and personas in this demo are entirely fictional. Any resemblance to real persons, living or dead, is purely coincidental.

A large portion of the content in guest profiles, biographies, forum discussions, and community content featured in this demo was generated by AI: we used Claude.ai to create examples of community interaction. Profile pictures for all the guests were created using ArtGuru.ai image generation.

About the Demo Team

This showcase was lovingly crafted by the Automattic Special Projects team to demonstrate the incredible potential of WordPress for community building. Every guest profile, forum post, and party detail was designed to show how technology can enhance rather than replace genuine human connection.

Want to explore what's possible for your own community? Start with WordPress, add some community-focused plugins, sprinkle in your unique vision, and watch something wonderful grow.

Photo Credits

The beautiful images throughout this demo site come from the talented photography community at Pexels, Unsplash, and OpenVerse. We're grateful to these photographers who make their work freely available, enabling projects like ours to showcase the warmth and connection that cozy communities can create.

Here's the list of original images, with links to where you can find them and their photographer credits.

item.dc:creator: cozy-communities-production
item.content:encoded:
OMG YES YES YES! 🎉
Leilani, you are absolutely BRILLIANT and I am here for ALL of this! As Alex's sister, I am officially appointing you as the Chief Surprise Coordinator because this plan is chef's kiss perfect!
I'm 1000% in and I come bearing gifts:
I have SO many embarrassing childhood videos of Alex (including the infamous "bathtub concert" from age 7 where they performed an entire Broadway show with shampoo bottles as props 😂) Mom already sent me like 50 photos but I can get her to dig up the REALLY good ones – like Alex's 8th birthday where they cried because the cake wasn't "rectangle enough"
I have Alex's phone number for their college roommate who moved to Japan – I bet they'd record something!
The timing is PERFECT too – dinner is when Alex will be all sentimental anyway, and the bonfire slideshow will make everyone cry happy tears (in the best way).
Also, PLEASE tell me those custom beach towels have the photo of Alex in the dinosaur costume from Halloween '05. If not, I'm sending you that picture immediately because it needs to be immortalized on terry cloth! 🦕
I'm uploading everything to your shared folder tonight. This is going to be EPIC and Alex is going to ugly cry (the good kind)!
Can we also coordinate who's filming their reaction? I need this documented for future sister blackmail purposes 😈
You're the best for organizing this!! 💕

item.dc:creator: agnes.veum
item.content:encoded: Justyn! I'm so here for story time! 🔥 I'm totally voting for option #2 (the GPS disaster road trip) because that sounds like peak Alex energy - "navigating by vibes" is literally how they approach everything in life and somehow it always works out perfectly! 😂 I've been trying to decide on my story too and I think I'm going with the time Alex convinced our entire dorm floor to have a "fancy dinner party" in the communal kitchen, complete with tablecloths made from bedsheets and "gourmet" ramen noodles. They turned the most basic college meal into this whole elegant experience and we all felt like we were dining at a five-star restaurant. Classic Alex move! Also YES to guitar accompaniment! Nothing says "meaningful bonfire vibes" like some gentle strumming in the background. Just maybe avoid anything too sad because you KNOW Alex is going to get emotional anyway (in the best way) 🎸✨ Can't wait to ugly cry around the fire with all of you! 💕

item.dc:creator: sofia_dances
item.content:encoded:
OMG you guys are making me emotional already and we haven't even started! 😭💕
Justyn, I'm team #2 as well! The "navigating by vibes" story is SO Alex - they probably turned getting lost into the most fun adventure ever. And Agnes, the fancy dorm dinner party story is PERFECT! I remember Alex telling me about that - they said you all felt like royalty eating ramen with plastic forks 👑
My story contribution: Remember when Alex dragged me to that "beginner-friendly" salsa class and we spent the entire first session just trying to figure out which foot goes where? By the end, we had invented our own dance style that was definitely NOT salsa, but Alex was so proud of our "creative interpretation" that they convinced the instructor to let us demonstrate it to the class! Pure chaos, pure Alex energy.
Justyn, I'm bringing my portable speaker too, so we can have some ambient music for the stories if you want backup for your guitar! Maybe some soft acoustic stuff to set the mood? 🎵 Fair warning: I'm definitely going to ugly cry during at least three of these stories. Someone please bring tissues! 🥺✨

Pure chaos, pure Alex energy.

item.dc:creator: cozy-communities-production
item.content:encoded:
Dallas, you are officially my new favorite person! 🙌
Thank you for stepping up as our grill master – I was literally lying awake last night panicking about the food coordination, so you just saved my sanity! Your menu sounds absolutely perfect, and I'm genuinely impressed that you're covering the veggie options too (Maya will be SO happy about those veggie burgers!).
I'm claiming buns and condiments duty – I'll bring:
* All the burger buns (regular, whole wheat, and some fancy brioche ones because why not?) * Hot dog buns * The full condiment arsenal: ketchup, mustard, mayo, BBQ sauce, that fancy sriracha aioli everyone loves * Pickles, onions, lettuce, tomatoes – basically a whole burger bar setup
I'm also thinking we need some sides to go with your grilling masterpiece, so I'm volunteering to coordinate a potato salad and maybe a pasta salad situation.
Question though: Should someone bring a cooler specifically for keeping your meat cold until grill time? I can handle that too if needed!
And LOL at judging our burger-flipping technique – I promise to stay FAR away from your grill and just appreciate your work from a safe distance with a drink in hand. That's probably better for everyone involved! 😂
This is going to be AMAZING. Alex is going to flip when they see this spread!

item.dc:creator: johnson77
item.content:encoded:
Sofia, Sofia, Sofia... 🤦‍♂️
I respect the confidence, I really do. But you're about to learn the difference between catching dance props and catching a frisbee when there's a 15 mph ocean breeze and sand getting in your eyes!
I've been throwing perfect spirals since I was 12, and my hand-eye coordination has been honed by years of flipping burgers without dropping a single patty. You think those pirouettes are going to help you when I send a frisbee sailing right past your victory dance moves?
Here's my counter-challenge: When (not if) I win this tournament, you have to let me teach YOU some proper throwing technique. And yes, there will be a step-by-step breakdown just like one of my grilling tutorials 😂
Bring those glow sticks though - you're gonna need something to light up the beach when you're picking yourself up off the sand! 🥏💪
Game on, dance floor queen! 👑

item.dc:creator: marcus.c.photo
item.content:encoded: grabs popcorn and camera 🍿📸 This is getting GOOD! I'm just here for the entertainment value, honestly. Dallas talking about "perfect spirals" while Sofia's planning victory dances... meanwhile, I'll be the one capturing every spectacular wipeout in glorious high-definition! My strategy is simple: stay back, document everything, and swoop in during the finals when everyone else is exhausted from all this trash talk energy 😎 Fair warning though - I've got some secret frisbee skills from all those hiking trips where we had to entertain ourselves during lunch breaks. Alex can vouch for my surprisingly decent backhand throw! But mostly I'm just excited to get some action shots of Sofia attempting to catch a frisbee while doing a pirouette, and Dallas realizing that grilling skills don't automatically translate to beach sports 📷 May the best trash talker win! (And may I get some Instagram-worthy shots in the process) ✨

item.dc:creator: cozy-communities-production
item.content:encoded:
Agnes, I've got you covered! 🚗✨
I'm driving from downtown too and have plenty of room in my SUV - consider yourself officially my co-pilot! And honestly, homemade cookies as payment? That's the best deal I've heard all week!
I was actually planning to leave around 12:30 PM to get there with plenty of time before the welcome drinks at 2:00. Does that timing work for you? We can grab coffee on the way if we're feeling fancy!
For everyone else coordinating rides: I still have 2 more seats available in my car if anyone else needs a lift from the downtown area! I'm the type of driver who keeps snacks, phone chargers, and definitely won't judge your music choices (though I draw the line at death metal at 8 AM 😂).
Agnes, I'm absolutely here for pre-party karaoke! Fair warning though - I have zero shame when it comes to belting out early 2000s pop hits, so prepare yourself for some truly questionable Britney Spears impressions. 🎤
This carpool coordination is such a great idea! Not only are we being eco-friendly, but road trip bonding time before we even get to the beach? Yes please!
Just DM me your address and we'll figure out the pickup logistics. This is going to be so fun! 🎉

item.dc:creator: agnes.veum
item.content:encoded:
Oh you guys are SO going down! 😤
And by "going down" I mean you'll probably trip over me because I'll definitely be diving dramatically for frisbees that are nowhere near me! My strategy is pure chaos - if I can't catch the frisbee properly, I'll at least confuse everyone else with my interpretive diving techniques 🤸‍♀️
Dallas, your "perfect spirals" won't help when I'm running in completely random directions! Sofia, your dance moves are no match for my signature move: the "Agnes Flail" (patent pending). And Marcus, good luck getting clear shots when I'm creating a one-person dust storm on the beach!
Plus I've got secret weapons: I'm bringing extra sunscreen for my teammates (team bonding!) AND I've been practicing my celebratory whooping sounds. You'll hear me cheering from three beaches away!
Fair warning: I may not be good at frisbee, but I'm EXCELLENT at making everyone laugh when they mess up. Psychological warfare at its finest! 😂🥏
Prepare yourselves for the most enthusiastic mediocre frisbee playing you've ever witnessed!

item.dc:creator: cozy-communities-production
item.content:encoded:
Marcus, you are a LIFESAVER! 📸✨
I was honestly starting to stress about how we were going to get good photos with everyone's phones and questionable selfie skills, so having an actual photography expert step up is amazing! Consider me your enthusiastic assistant director - I'm 100% here for being bossed around if it means we get incredible shots!
I love all your pose ideas, especially the walking toward camera one - that's going to look so natural and fun! And yes to the jumping shot! I don't care if it's cliché, Alex is going to absolutely lose it (in the best way) when they see all of us mid-air looking ridiculous.
Can I make one tiny request? Could we also do a few shots during the bonfire time? I know the lighting will be totally different, but there's something so magical about that warm fire glow that would be perfect for capturing the cozy storytelling moments. Plus Alex's face when we surprise them with all the birthday shenanigans!
I'm also volunteering to be your photo assistant throughout the day - someone needs to wrangle people for the candid shots and make sure everyone's aware when you're trying to capture those perfect unposed moments. I'm excellent at distracting people so they look natural! 😂
Thank you for thinking of individual friend group shots too! This party is going to be so well documented, and Alex is going to have the most incredible photo memories.
You're the best for organizing this! 📷💕

item.dc:creator: johnson77
item.content:encoded: Count me IN! Finally someone who admits their serves are unreliable 😂 I'll take "enthusiastic spirit over skill" any day - that's exactly the energy our team needs! Plus I actually know how to play, so we might accidentally be good. Team "Sandy Cheeks" has my vote! 🏐

item.dc:creator: hwindler
item.content:encoded: Agnes, I LOVE the team name ideas! I'm signing up and I promise to bring my A-game (which is... decent? Maybe?) I can also help organize the bracket if we get enough teams. Should we do a sign-up sheet for positions or just wing it? Either way, I'm in! 📋🏐

item.dc:creator: marcus.c.photo
item.content:encoded:
FINALLY, my people! 📸
I volunteer as official cheering squad photographer AND motivational chant leader. I’ll capture all the epic plays while shouting things like “You got this!” and “That was totally intentional!”
My cheering strategy: stay safely behind the action line with snacks and my camera, ready to document both victories and spectacular fails.
Sign me up! 🎉

item.title: Frisbee Tournament Rules & Trash Talk Thread
item.dc:creator: cozy-communities-production

item.title: Group Photo Poses: Ideas to Make Us Look Cool
item.dc:creator: marcus.c.photo
item.content:encoded:
Photography nerd reporting for duty! 📸 I've been thinking about our group photo setup and I have OPINIONS (shocking, I know). With that gorgeous ocean backdrop at 5 PM, we're going to have perfect golden hour lighting – this could be magazine-worthy if we play it right! Here are some pose ideas that won't make us look like awkward penguins:
  • Classic tiered formation but everyone turns slightly toward the center
  • Walking toward camera in a loose line (candid vibes!)
  • Everyone jumping at the same time (yes, it's cliché but Alex will love it)
I'm bringing my good camera AND a tripod, so we can get multiple angles. Also, I volunteer as tribute to take individual friend group shots throughout the day – consider me your personal party paparazzi! Who's brave enough to let me direct them for 30 seconds? I promise I won't be too bossy… okay, I might be a little bossy 😅

item.title: Who's Bringing What? Potluck Coordination
item.dc:creator: johnson77
item.content:encoded:
Alright party people, the grill master has arrived! 🔥 I'm volunteering to handle ALL the grilling duties – and I mean ALL of it. I've got my trusty portable grill, premium charcoal (none of that gas nonsense), and my secret spice blend that's been in the family for generations (okay, I invented it last year, but it's still amazing). Here's what I'm bringing to the meat department:
  • Burgers (beef AND turkey for variety)
  • Hot dogs (the good kind, not those mystery meat ones)
  • Marinated chicken skewers
  • Veggie burgers for our plant-based friends (yes, I know how to grill those too!)
I'll also bring all the grilling tools, extra propane backup (just in case), and way too much aluminum foil. What I NEED from you all: buns, condiments, sides, and someone to keep me company at the grill! Fair warning – I will judge your burger-flipping technique if you try to "help" 😂 Who's covering what? Let's get this coordination locked down!

item.title: Top Secret Birthday Surprise Planning (DON'T LET ALEX SEE THIS)
item.dc:creator: hwindler
item.content:encoded:
Okay conspirators, we need to get ORGANIZED! 🕵️‍♀️
I've been thinking about Alex's surprise and I have a foolproof plan, but I need everyone's help to pull it off. What if we coordinate a surprise video montage from all the friends who couldn't make it? I can collect videos throughout the week and play it during dinner!
Also, I secretly reached out to Alex's mom and she's sending her favorite childhood photos for a "25 Years of Alex" slideshow. I'm thinking we project it during the bonfire?
I've already made a shared folder (link in my profile) where everyone can upload photos and videos. Let's make this the most memorable surprise ever! Who's in?
P.S. - I may have also ordered custom beach towels with embarrassing baby photos of Alex. Sorry not sorry! 😂

item.title: Story circle prep time! 📖🔥
item.dc:creator: kelsie.jacobson
item.content:encoded:
I've been thinking about what story to share around the bonfire and I'm torn between three options:
  1. The time Alex and I got lost hiking and ended up having a 3-hour philosophical debate about whether hot dogs are sandwiches (we still disagree)
  2. That epic road trip where Alex's GPS died and we "navigated by vibes" for 200 miles
  3. The night we stayed up until sunrise writing terrible song lyrics about our college professors
I'm leaning toward #2 because it perfectly captures Alex's "everything will work out" attitude that we all love! Anyone else practicing their stories? I volunteer to bring my guitar for some acoustic accompaniment if people want background music while they share. Nothing says "meaningful bonfire moment" like some gentle strumming! Also, does anyone know if Alex still cries during emotional stories? Asking for a friend... 😂🎸 What stories are you all planning to share?

item.title: Carpool Coordination Thread - Save Gas, Make Friends
item.dc:creator: agnes.veum
item.content:encoded:
Hey beach party squad! 🚗💨 So I may have gotten a little too excited about this party and completely forgot that my car is currently in the shop (don't ask about the parking meter incident... 🙈). I'm looking for a ride from the downtown area and I promise I'm an excellent passenger! I bring snacks, good playlists, and absolutely zero backseat driving. I can chip in for gas and I'll even throw in some of my famous homemade cookies as payment! But this got me thinking - why don't we all coordinate carpools? It's better for the environment, saves money, AND gives us extra party time to catch up on the drive! Drop a comment if you:
  • Need a ride (like moi!)
  • Have extra seats in your car
  • Want to split gas costs
  • Just want road trip buddies
Let's turn the drive to Alex's party into part of the celebration! Who's in for some pre-party karaoke sessions? 🎤

item.dc:creator: kelsie.jacobson
item.content:encoded:
Cheering squad with live acoustic soundtrack? I'm SO in! 🎸
I can provide inspirational background music for the games - think "Eye of the Tiger" but on acoustic guitar and way more chill. I'll also bring my portable speaker for when we need to blast some real pump-up music.
Fair warning: I may start an impromptu sing-along during timeouts. The team that sings together, wins together, right? 🎵

item.dc:creator: marcus.c.photo
item.content:encoded:
Emily, you're making me blush! 😊📸
YES to bonfire photos! I was already planning to stick around for those - you're absolutely right about that warm fire glow being magical. I'll bring my low-light gear specifically for those cozy storytelling moments. There's something about firelight that makes everyone look like they're in a movie!
I love that you want to be my photo assistant! Having someone to help wrangle people is going to be a game-changer. You know how it is - the second I say "candid shot" everyone suddenly forgets how to act natural 😂
Your idea about distracting people is GENIUS. Some of my best shots happen when people are laughing at something completely unrelated to the camera. We're going to make such a good team!
Also, I'm totally here for being the "bossy photographer" if it means Alex gets amazing memories from their 25th. They deserve nothing less than magazine-quality documentation of this celebration!
Can't wait to capture all the magic with you as my partner in crime! ✨

item.dc:creator: johnson77
item.content:encoded:
Hey everyone! 🚗
I'm driving my pickup truck from the west side and I've got room for 2 passengers, plus plenty of space in the truck bed for anyone's beach gear, coolers, or party supplies that won't fit in their own cars.
Emily, smart thinking on the early departure time! I was planning to head out around 12:00 PM since I'm bringing all the grilling equipment and want to get the setup started early. If anyone wants to ride with me, fair warning: my truck bed will be loaded with BBQ gear, so it's going to smell like charcoal and my secret spice blend the whole ride 😂
Also volunteering my truck for any last-minute supply runs or if anyone needs help transporting bigger items to the beach. Just let me know!
Agnes, save me some of those cookies - I'll trade you some perfectly grilled burgers for them! 🍪🍔

item.dc:creator: sofia_dances
item.content:encoded:
OMG you guys are amazing! 💕🚗
I was planning to take the bus but honestly, a carpool sounds SO much better! I'm coming from the east side (near the metro station) and would love to catch a ride with anyone heading that direction.
I promise I'm the best carpool entertainment - I've got the ultimate road trip playlist ready (think feel-good classics mixed with some guilty pleasure pop), and I'm basically a human energy drink so I'll keep everyone hyped for the party! Plus I can navigate like nobody's business if needed 📱
Dallas, your truck sounds perfect if you're going anywhere near the east side! I don't mind riding with the BBQ gear - honestly, arriving at the party smelling like your secret spice blend sounds like a bonus 😂
I can pitch in for gas obviously, and I'll bring extra snacks for the road! Fair warning though: I WILL try to start a car karaoke session. It's basically mandatory road trip behavior! 🎵
Anyone else need a ride from the east side? We could make this a whole convoy situation! ✨

item.dc:creator: marcus.c.photo
item.content:encoded:
This is AMAZING and I am absolutely here for it! 📸✨ Leilani, your organizational skills are legendary! And Emily, those childhood videos sound like pure GOLD - I'm dying to see this bathtub Broadway performance 😂 I'm volunteering for multiple roles here:
  1. Official Reaction Photographer - I'll discreetly position myself to capture Alex's face during the video montage AND the slideshow. We need to document every single emotion!
  2. Technical Support - I can help with the projection setup for the bonfire slideshow and make sure the video montage plays smoothly during dinner
  3. Contributing Evidence - I have some great hiking photos of Alex from our adventures, including that time they got so excited about reaching a summit that they did a victory dance on a rock (it's adorable and definitely slideshow-worthy)
Emily, YES to filming the reaction! I'll set up my camera on a tripod to get the wide shot while someone else can get close-ups with their phone. We need this from every angle! Also uploading to the shared folder tonight. Alex is going to be such an emotional mess, and it's going to be BEAUTIFUL! 🥺📷 This party is going to be legendary!

item.title: Best Beach Playlist Suggestions - Drop Your Summer Jams
item.dc:creator: sofia_dances
item.content:encoded: We need the perfect soundtrack for Alex's beach party! Whether it's chill vibes for welcome drinks, pump-up songs for beach games, or sunset dinner ambiance, drop your music suggestions here. Let's create playlists that'll make this celebration absolutely unforgettable!

item.dc:creator: sofia_dances
item.content:encoded:
Okay party people, it's MUSIC TIME! 🎵✨ I've been working on the ultimate beach party soundtrack and I need ALL your input! We need different vibes for different parts of the day, so here's what I'm thinking: Welcome Drinks - Chill but Happy:
  • "Levitating" - Dua Lipa (perfect beach energy!)
  • "As It Was" - Harry Styles (everyone knows this one)
  • "Anti-Hero" - Taylor Swift (because why not?)
Beach Games - High Energy:
  • "Uptown Funk" - Bruno Mars (classic crowd pleaser)
  • "Good 4 U" - Olivia Rodrigo (gets everyone hyped)
  • "Heat Waves" - Glass Animals (summer vibes!)
Sunset Dinner - Mellow but Warm:
  • "Golden" - Harry Styles (literally perfect for sunset)
  • "Adorn" - Miguel (smooth and romantic)
Dance Party - ALL THE BANGERS:
  • Anything that makes you want to move! This is where I need the most help!
Drop your suggestions below! What songs make YOU want to dance like nobody's watching? And yes, I'm absolutely taking requests for throwback hits and guilty pleasure songs! Let's make Alex's 25th have the PERFECT soundtrack! 🎶

item.dc:creator: kelsie.jacobson
item.content:encoded:
Hey food squad! 🌮✨
This coordination is looking incredible already - Dallas, you're a legend for taking on all that grilling! And Emily, that condiment setup sounds like heaven!
I'm jumping in to handle the appetizer and snack situation because let's be real, we're going to need munchies during those beach games! Here's what I'm bringing:
* Fresh fruit platter (watermelon, pineapple, grapes - perfect for hot beach weather) * Chips and guac (homemade guac because I'm extra like that 🥑) * Veggie tray with hummus * Those little pinwheel sandwiches that are perfect for grabbing between volleyball sets * And my specialty: spicy mango salsa that pairs perfectly with literally everything Dallas is grilling!
I'm also thinking we might want some late-night munchies for the bonfire crowd? I can throw together a s'mores kit with all the fixings - graham crackers, chocolate, marshmallows, plus some fun variations like peanut butter cups and strawberries for the fancy s'mores experience!
Question for the group: Should someone coordinate drinks beyond the welcome cocktails? I'm happy to bring a cooler of sodas, water, and maybe some beer if people want options throughout the day?
This menu is shaping up to be EPIC! Alex is going to be so spoiled! 🎉

item.dc:creator: agnes.veum
item.content:encoded:
Sofia, YES! I am SO here for this! 🎵 I've been curating the perfect beach party playlist in my head for weeks! Here are my contributions: Welcome Drinks Vibes:
  • "Watermelon Sugar" - Harry Styles (peak summer energy)
  • "Blinding Lights" - The Weeknd (gets everyone moving)
  • "Flowers" - Miley Cyrus (empowering and fun!)
Beach Games Pump-Up:
  • "Can't Stop the Feeling" - Justin Timberlake (impossible not to smile)
  • "Sunflower" - Post Malone (chill but upbeat)
Sunset Dinner Chill:
  • "Stay" - Rihanna (classic and not too distracting from conversation)
  • "Ocean Eyes" - Billie Eilish (dreamy sunset vibes)
Fair warning: I may have included like 47 Taylor Swift songs in my original draft, but I narrowed it down to the essentials 😂 Also voting for at least ONE throwback slow song for when we inevitably get sentimental during dinner! What do you think?

item.dc:creator: kelsie.jacobson
item.content:encoded:
This is my JAM! 🎸✨ (Literally, music is my thing) Sofia, your playlist structure is perfect! I'm adding some acoustic and indie vibes to balance out the energy: Welcome Drinks - Chill Acoustic:
  • "Riptide" - Vance Joy (perfect beach song)
  • "Better Days" - OneRepublic (good vibes only)
  • "Budapest" - George Ezra (everyone loves this one)
Sunset Dinner - Soulful & Warm:
  • "Banana Pancakes" - Jack Johnson (ultimate chill)
  • "Three Little Birds" - Bob Marley (everything's gonna be alright)
  • "Here Comes the Sun" - The Beatles (classic and perfect timing)
Dance Party - Throwback Gold:
  • "Mr. Brightside" - The Killers (EVERYONE will sing along)
  • "Don't Stop Believin'" - Journey (mandatory group sing-along)
Agnes, YES to sentimental slow songs! I vote for "Wonderwall" during bonfire time - I can play it live on guitar if people want that acoustic moment 🔥🎶 Alex is going to love this soundtrack!

  • "Better Days" - OneRepublic (good vibes only)
  • "Budapest" - George Ezra (everyone loves this one)
Sunset Dinner - Soulful & Warm:
  • "Banana Pancakes" - Jack Johnson (ultimate chill)
  • "Three Little Birds" - Bob Marley (everything's gonna be alright)
  • "Here Comes the Sun" - The Beatles (classic and perfect timing)
Dance Party - Throwback Gold:
  • "Mr. Brightside" - The Killers (EVERYONE will sing along)
  • "Don't Stop Believin'" - Journey (mandatory group sing-along)
Agnes, YES to sentimental slow songs! I vote for "Wonderwall" during bonfire time - I can play it live on guitar if people want that acoustic moment 🔥🎶 Alex is going to love this item.dc:creator: hwindler
item.content:encoded: Okay okay, I see y'all with the crowd pleasers, but let me add some SPICE to this playlist! 🌶️🎵 Don't get me wrong, I love a good Harry Styles moment, but we need some variety that's gonna make people go "OH THIS IS MY SONG!" Here are my curveball additions: Welcome Drinks – Let's Get Groovy: * "Lost in the Light" – Bahamas (underrated beach perfection) * "Peaches" – Justin Bieber (don't @ me, it's catchy) * "Good as Hell" – Lizzo (clean version - pure confidence vibes!) Beach Games – Songs That Hit Different: * "Physical" – Dua Lipa (perfect volleyball energy) * "Bad Habit" – Steve Lacy (this song is EVERYWHERE for a reason) * "About Damn Time" – Lizzo (clean version - pure joy in musical form) Sunset Dinner – Unexpected Chill: * "Best Part" – Daniel Caesar ft. H.E.R. (pure butter) * "Sure Thing" – Miguel (smooth and family-friendly) Dance Party – The Songs That Make EVERYONE Move: * "Shut Up and Dance" – Walk The Moon (impossible to resist) * "Cupid" – FIFTY FIFTY (TikTok made us all love this) * "Dancing Queen" – ABBA (because Alex deserves to feel like royalty!) * "Can't Stop the Feeling" – Justin Timberlake (Agnes had the right idea!) Justyn, I'm HERE for the live acoustic "Wonderwall" moment! And since we'll have mixed ages with family potentially listening, I made sure all my picks are clean - we want everyone singing along without any awkward moments! 💃 This mix is gonna be PERFECT – something for every mood and every person! 🎉

item.title: Blog Home
item.dc:creator: cozy-communities-production
item.content:encoded:
Join us in celebrating Alex's 25th trip around the sun!

Hey there! 🎉 We’re so excited you’ll be joining us to celebrate Alex’s 25th birthday at the beach. This is more than just a party—it’s a reunion of friends who’ve shared countless laughs, memories, and adventures together. Let’s reconnect, reminisce about the good old days, and create new memories that Alex will cherish for years to come. This website is your go-to hub for everything related to the big day. Let’s make this celebration unforgettable!

Get all of the party details here!

Our comprehensive suite of professional services caters to a diverse clientele, ranging from homeowners to commercial developers.

Itinerary

Join us for a day of sun, fun, and unforgettable moments as we celebrate Alex’s 25th birthday with friends, laughter, and a packed schedule of beachside activities.

Venue

Set against the stunning backdrop of Golden Sands Shore, our beach venue is the perfect place to relax, reconnect, and make new memories with Alex and friends.

Guest Community Portal

Stay connected before, during, and after the party in our community portal, where you can share photos, memories, and messages with Alex and the entire crew.

"Alex’s parties are always legendary, but this one is going to be next-level! The beach, the bonfire, and all of us reunited—what more could we ask for?"

Taylor

Master of Party Vibes & Head of Bonfire Toast Management

Announcements

No posts were found.
